name: Shelley's Creation
description:
[Please use Oculus Quest with controllers]  
This is a paid preview app to fund further development (e.g., more interaction, voices, animations, props...). Thanks for your support!

[v0.74]

  • To move forward, please hold the "grip" button on the side of the controller and swing up/down (like jogging).
  • You will meet other players (ghosts) in the scenes, but you will not be able to talk to each other. This is an immersive theater.

--

Shelley’s Creation is an immersive theater that presents Mary Shelley’s inspirations to create the famous sci-fi gothic novel - Frankenstein.

Put on your headset to attend this multiplayer exploration. You are traveling as a ghost to the year 1816 when Mary Shelley started her novel - Frankenstein, or the Modern Prometheus. You found yourself inside part of the story of Mary Shelley’s Frankenstein, Lord Byron and Percy Shelley’s poems in the romanticism era, and John Milton’s Paradise Lost. 

Which way will you choose? Paradise or hell?
